name: Pure Evil
description:
Warning: May contain bright flashes!

[CONTROLS]

WASD Movement

V - Adjust volume in game

Left Click: Progress dialogue, use weapons(Click and hold), etc.

Tip: The Big Eye waits for no one. The beam from it causes immense damage so be careful!

This game was made for the GeoJam with the theme: The Other Side.

I still have a bit of polishing to do, but for the most part, I atleast have a playable version all throughout the story. I'm highly proud of what was accomplished within these 3-4 days of developing this. Hope you guys enjoy! Feedback would be much appreciated!

[CREDITS]
